headTitle: Princes Street Hostel, Edinburgh - 2022 - Contact us
title: Contact Us
desc: We'd love to hear from you !

contactPageTexts.textTopOne: You can reach out to us in two different ways
contactPageTexts.textTopTwo: For a quick question and a quick answer (e.g. inform us of a late arrival) the best is to send us a message via WhatsApp.
contactPageTexts.textTopThree: For a question about a booking, a group reservation, etc.,  it might be best to send us an email at hello@princesstreethostel.com
contactPageTexts.textBottomOne: Don't forget to check out our F.A.Q page as the question you have might already be answered !
contactPageTexts.textBottomTwo: For business enquiries, collaborations, etc., contact us via biz@princesstreethostel.com
